00001 /* 
00002  * jcom.init
00003  * External for Jamoma: send bang to initialize something
00004  *      bang source may be global or for just one module
00005  * By Tim Place, Copyright © 2006
00006  * 
00007  * License: This code is licensed under the terms of the GNU LGPL
00008  * http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html 
00009  */
00010 
00011 #include "Jamoma.h"
00012 
00013 // Data Structure for this object
00014 typedef struct _init{
00015         t_jcom_core_subscriber_common   common;
00016         void                                                    *outlet;
00017         void                                                    *dumpout;
00018 } t_init;
00019 
00020 // Prototypes for methods
00021 void *init_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);                   // New Object Creation Method
00022 void init_assist(t_init *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);  // Assistance Method
00023 void init_go(t_init *x);
00024 void init_bang(t_init *x);
00025 
00026 // Globals
00027 t_class                 *g_init_class;                  // Required. Global pointing to this class
00028 
00029 
00030 /************************************************************************************/
00031 // Main() Function
00032 
00033 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00034 {
00035         t_class         *c;
00036         t_object        *attr;
00037         long            offset;
00038         
00039         jamoma_init();
00040 
00041         // Define our class
00042         c = class_new("jcom.init",(method)init_new, (method)jcom_core_subscriber_common_free, 
00043                 (short)sizeof(t_init), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00044         offset = calcoffset(t_init, common);
00045         class_obexoffset_set(c, offset + calcoffset(t_jcom_core_subscriber_common, obex));
00046 
00047         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00048         class_addmethod(c, (method)init_bang,                           "bang",                 0L);
00049         class_addmethod(c, (method)init_go,                                     "go",                   A_CANT, 0);
00050     class_addmethod(c, (method)init_assist,                             "assist",               A_CANT, 0L);
00051         
00052         jcom_core_subscriber_classinit_common(c, attr, offset); 
00053         
00054         // Finalize our class
00055         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00056         g_init_class = c;
00057 
00058         return 0;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 /************************************************************************************/
00063 // Object Life
00064 
00065 // Create
00066 void *init_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00067 {
00068         long            attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);               // support normal arguments
00069         t_init          *x = (t_init *)object_alloc(g_init_class);
00070         t_symbol        *name = _sym_nothing;
00071 
00072         if(attrstart && argv)
00073                 atom_arg_getsym(&name, 0, attrstart, argv);
00074         else
00075                 name = symbol_unique();
00076         
00077         if(x){
00078                 x->dumpout = outlet_new(x, NULL);
00079                 x->outlet = outlet_new(x, NULL);
00080                 object_obex_store((void *)x, ps_dumpout, (object *)x->dumpout);         // setup the dumpout
00081 
00082                 jcom_core_subscriber_new_common(&x->common, name, ps_subscribe_init);
00083                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                                       // handle attribute args                                
00084 
00085                 defer_low(x, (method)jcom_core_subscriber_subscribe, 0, 0, 0);
00086         }
00087         return (x);                                                                                             // Return the pointer
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 /************************************************************************************/
00092 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00093 
00094 // Method for Assistance Messages
00095 void init_assist(t_init *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00096 {
00097         if(msg==1)      // Inlets
00098                 strcpy(dst, "bang is passed through to the outlet");
00099         else if(msg==2){ // Outlets
00100                 if(arg == 0) 
00101                         strcpy(dst, "bang on initialization");
00102                 else 
00103                         strcpy(dst, "dumpout");
00104         }
00105 }
00106 
00107 // GO!
00108 void init_go(t_init *x)
00109 {
00110         outlet_bang(x->outlet);
00111 }
00112 
00113 // BANG!
00114 void init_bang(t_init *x)
00115 {
00116         if(x->common.hub != NULL)
00117                 object_method(x->common.hub, ps_init);
00118 }
